lead_paragraph: Kohei Uchimura's clumsy slip on the horizontal bar not only shocked fans at the Rio Olympic Arena on Saturday but came to represent a horror day for Japan's men's gymnastics team in their efforts to dethrone China as Olympic champions.

headline.print_headline: Gymnastics: Day of Horrors Leave Japan With Work to Do
headline.main: Gymnastics: Day of Horrors Leave Japan With Work to Do
